feed.title: Hayday - News
feed.subtitle: RSS wrapper of Hayday inbox News

entry.title: Visitor Milestone Info
entry.content:
Join the Visitor Milestone Challenge to get the Crescent Gazebo!

Esteemed farmers, your diligent efforts in dispatching numerous trucks have been commendable. Regrettably, despite your endeavors, the Crescent Gazebo decoration eluded our grasp. But another golden opportunity presents itself! Serve a grand total of 50 million visitors today and tomorrow. Should we achieve this ambitious goal, the majestic Crescent Gazebo decoration will be yours for free!

Mark your calendars, for after we reach the goal, it shall be available in the shop on Saturday as a token of our collective effort. Let us unite; together, we can do it!

entry.title: Hay Day Events Week 17!
entry.content:
Hay Day Events Week 17!

Hello farmers! Not much left of April, but we have another week full of Events! All Events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each Event by visiting our Event Board in the game.

Monday: Spin The Wheel (1 Puzzle Piece Guaranteed, Possibility for 2)

Tuesday: Truck Order Event (Extra Land Expansion Materials)

Wednesday: Boat Event (Extra Vouchers)

Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (2x Coins)

Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (All Fish 20% boost) + 2x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitor Event (Extra Barn & Silo Upgrade Materials) + Truck Order Event (2x Coins)

Sunday: Animal Feed Time Percent (3 random types of animals feed produced)+ Boat Event (2x Coins)

Have a great week!

entry.title: New Supercell game going global!
entry.content:
New milestone unlocked!

In order to THANK YOU all for supporting the Squad Busters launch, we've added a new milestone to the pre-registration reward track!

If we reach 40M pre-registrations before May 29, this beautiful Deco will be available at launch, and claimable for only a month!

To celebrate the global release of Squad Busters, all Supercell games are giving away free and exclusive rewards for each milestone the community achieves.

How it works

Pre-Register for Squad Busters on the App Store or Google Play before the global release on the 29th of May. By pre-registering you will get the game right away when it becomes globally available on the App Store or Google Play.

Follow the progress of the community effort on the reward tracker and don't forget to claim the rewards as they unlock.

Progress updated daily.

Squad up and make sure to tell your friends!

ðŸ‘‰App store linkðŸ‘ˆ

What is Squad Busters?

Squad Busters is a game where you can play with your favorite Supercell characters in fun and action-packed matches. Travel through different worlds, collect new characters, and evolve them to take down massive monsters as you continually build your ultimate squad.

Currently available in Canada, Spain, Mexico, Finland, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, and Singapore, Squad busters will release worldwide on May 29th.

ðŸ“º [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

entry.title: Hay Day Events Week 18!
entry.content:
Hay Day Events Week 18!

Hello farmers! It's gonna be May! Let's start this new month with some fresh Events. All Events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each Event by visiting our Event Board in the game.

Monday: Spin The Wheel (Extra Vouchers)

Tuesday: Town Visitor Event (2x XP)

Wednesday: Boat Event (Extra Boosters) + 2x Farm Pass Points

Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (2x Coins)

Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (Duck Salon and Net Maker, 30%) + 2x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitor Event (2x XP)

Sunday: Crop Boost Event (3 Crops instead of 2, 3 random crops)

Have a great week!

entry.title: Golden Week Milestone Info
entry.content:
Join the Golden Week Milestone Challenge to get the Samurai Helmet!

Hey Farmers! A new golden opportunity! While you all enjoy the Golden Week Truck Event, we wanted to give you even more rewards for all your dedication! Let's start truckin'!

If we all work together to serve as many truck deliveries as possible, not only will you unlock additional Golden Week Currency, but if we achieve 350 million deliveries, as a special reward, you can unlock an exclusive decoration: the magnificent Samurai Helmet, for free!

Keep an eye on your inbox to track our progress towards this milestone, and when it's time to collect your rewards, head over to the shop. You'll find them waiting as free items, just a scroll past all the other offers.

Let's all do our best this week and work together to achieve our goal!

entry.title: Summer Update Release Notes
entry.content:
Get ready for Hay Day's Birthday Rock'n'Roll Show with the new update!

New Features:

  • Decoration Collections

We are releasing a new way of showcasing your decoration collections in a stylish book format! Each page is dedicated to a specific theme, displaying your themed decoration sets. June is all about Rock'n'Roll!

Complete collections by obtaining all the listed decorations, then claim special rewards for your hard work.

You can visit other players' farms and see their progress by clicking the adorable poodle next to the Farm Pass chick house.Â 

Remember that each collection is available for a limited time only, so make sure to keep an eye on your collection book, which has all the info needed for current sets of decos.

  • Decoration Shop Improvements

We have designed new categories and filtering systems for the decoration shop. Once we make sure they improve your decorating experience, we will release the changes throughout the upcoming weeks for all players.

  • Surprise BoxesÂ 

Surprise boxes will provide a fun and exciting way to obtain exclusive decorations or items, much like spinning the Wheel of Fortune. You will see some of these fun boxes placed as rewards or in the shop as offers.Â 

New Content:

New Temporary Production Building

  • Balloon Maker

New Products:

  • Rockâ€™nâ€™Roll styled balloons

Rockâ€™nâ€™Roll Decorations:

Get ready to see the Guitarist, Music Idols, Drummer, Venue Sign, Band Poster, Meet and Greet, Rock Dancers, and more!

New Pet:

  • American Flamingo

Fixes:Â 

  • Farm Pass chick is 35% faster.

  • Buying boosters from the seasonal catalog won't take booster storage space anymore

  • Production building boost events work now also in level 14 (before masteries are unlocked at level 15)

  • Friendbook: The search button is back, and we updated the scroll area so it does not overlap with the wood panel.

! Important note: From now on, the diamond reward for updating your game will be available in the shop as a free offer, as opposed to being sent through Alfred, our trusty postman.

Watch our latest Dairy News episode for more information regarding the upcoming events.Â

entry.title: Birthday Milestone Info
entry.content:
We are giving away 1 MILLION DIAMONDS to 4 lucky farmers and one exclusive decoration to the whole community!

We have prepared a new community milestone to celebrate Hay Day's 12th birthday! Your mission? Fill up the tracking bar by producing balloons with the new Balloon Maker, then ship them off on boat orders to receive the new birthday currency: musical notes.

The goal for all of you is to reach as many musical notes as possible together as a community. These are the milestones:

  • 1 billion musical notes -Â  1 x Surprise Box

  • 2 billion musical notes -Â  2 x Surprise Box

  • 4 billion musical notes - 10 x Diamonds

  • 6 billion musical notes - 1 x Light Tech Deco

And donâ€™t worry, spending the currency in the catalog wonâ€™t affect your progress.

But that's not even the best part: 4 players who participate in the Birthday event will receive 1 MILLION DIAMONDS.Â 

We will randomly select one player for every milestone the community reaches and send them the 1 million diamonds!Â  Everyone has an equal chance of becoming one of the winners.

When it's time to collect your rewards, head over to the shop. You'll find them waiting as free items, just a scroll past the Farm Pass offers.

The community event will last for ten days, and it starts now!

entry.title: Million Diamonds Winners
entry.content:
Congratulations to the winners!

Here are the farmers who won 1 million diamonds during the Birthday Milestone:

Milestone 1: #YUR90R890

Milestone 2: #Y0QU22Y9P

Milestone 3: #PRQVP9Y8R

Milestone 4: #9LVV2CRRQ

As a reminder, they were chosen randomly, and the requirements to participate were:

  • Be at least on level 17.

  • Participation in the Birthday Boat Event.

Saturday: Town Visitor (2x XP) + Truck Event (2x Coins)

Have an amazing week!
